name: test_e2e_with_logs[759_REDIR_URL_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `REDIR_URL_002` |
| **Name** | Open redirect via next param protocol-relative |
| **Category** | OPEN_REDIRECT |
| **Subcategory** | url_param |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `next=//evil.com`
- **Encoded**: `next%3D%2F%2Fevil.com`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~13000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:56:16.000 UTC

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
